data.comment: The first-half is just kicking off.
Free kick Philadelphia.
In the minute 2, Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Goal kick for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 5, Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro misses with an attempt on goal.
Joseph Dickerson awards New England a goal kick.
Joseph Dickerson signals a New England throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
In the minute 6, Throw-in for New England at Subaru Park.
Joseph Dickerson signals a throw-in for Philadelphia, close to New England's area.
Philadelphia are pushing forward but Jose Martinez's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 7, New England have a goal kick.
Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In the minute 9, Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in New England.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of New England.
In the minute 13, Corner awarded to New England.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
New England drive upfield and Gustavo Bou gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Philadelphia defender.
In the minute 14, Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Chester, Adam Buksa of New England is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 17, New England have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
Gustavo Bou of New England gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 21, Ball goes out of play for a Philadelphia goal kick.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England.
In the minute 24, Corner awarded to New England.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England just outside Philadelphia's area.
Goal! New England have taken a 0-1 lead courtesy of a header from Adam Buksa.
In the minute 26, Carles Gil instrumental with a fine assist.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Jakob Glesnes (Philadelphia) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 29, Gustavo Bou gets his shot on target but fails to score for New England.
Throw-in New England.
New England take a comfortable 0-2 lead thanks to Tajon Buchanan.
In the minute 30, That's a fine assist from Carles Gil.
Alejandro Bedoya (Philadelphia) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
New England awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Kacper Przybylko (Philadelphia) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
Kacper Przybylko (Philadelphia) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
In the minute 37, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the home team.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 39, Throw-in for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
Joseph Dickerson awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Philadelphia in the half of New England.
In the minute 40, Philadelphia are caught offside.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 43, Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New England territory.
Joseph Dickerson blows against Philadelphia's Jamiro Monteiro for offside.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
In the minute 45, Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
1 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Can Philadelphia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in New England's half?
In the minute 45, Throw-in for New England at Subaru Park.
The whistle has gone to end the first-half.
Joseph Dickerson has blown to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Ilsinho is on a sub for Jose Martinez for Philadelphia.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Adam Buksa (New England) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 52, Carles Gil hits the bar! Very nearly a goal there for New England in Chester.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
In the minute 53, New England push upfield but Joseph Dickerson quickly pulls them for offside.
Philadelphia have a dangerous throw-in.
Philadelphia to take a throw-in in New England territory.
In the minute 55, Throw-in for New England in their own half.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
Philadelphia push forward at Subaru Park and Ilsinho gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined New England defence.
In the minute 58, Ball safe as New England is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia's Alejandro Bedoya gets in a shot but it is blocked by a New England defender.
In the minute 60, Ball goes out of play for a New England goal kick.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
Jack Elliott is replacing Brendan Aaronson for Philadelphia at Subaru Park.
In the minute 62, The home team replace Sergio Santos with Cory Burke.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Philadelphia close to the penalty box.
Kacper Przybylko (Philadelphia) gets in a header on goal but the attempt is cleared.
In the minute 65, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Philadelphia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson awards New England a goal kick.
In the minute 66, The away team have replaced Teal Bunbury with Kelyn Rowe. This is the first substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 68, Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Can New England get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Philadelphia's half?
New England have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 71, New England's Henry Kessler gets in a shot on goal at Subaru Park. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
In the minute 73, Kai Wagner for Philadelphia has been booked by Joseph Dickerson and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick for New England in their own half.
New England's Adam Buksa has run offside.
In the minute 76, Jim Curtin is making the team's fourth substitution at Subaru Park with Anthony Fontana replacing Raymon Gaddis.
Corner awarded to Philadelphia.
Joseph Dickerson signals a New England throw-in in Philadelphia's half.
New England awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 78, Bruce Arena (New England) is making a second substitution, with Tommy McNamara replacing Gustavo Bou.
Throw-in for New England in the half of Philadelphia.
In the minute 80, Throw-in high up the field for New England in Chester.
Joseph Dickerson awards the away team a throw-in.
Philadelphia have been awarded a corner by Joseph Dickerson.
In the minute 82, Anthony Fontana for Philadelphia drives towards goal at Subaru Park. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Ball safe as Philadelphia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in Philadelphia.
In the minute 85, Free kick in a good position for New England!
In Chester a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 88, Free kick Philadelphia.
Matt Polster (New England) gets a yellow card.
Justin Rennicks is replacing Adam Buksa for the away team.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Chester.
Throw-in for Philadelphia in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to Philadelphia in their own half.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England in their own half.
Philadelphia have a goal kick.
Philadelphia drives forward and Cory Burke gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Joseph Dickerson signals a free kick to New England.
Free kick for Philadelphia in their own half.
Philadelphia awarded a free kick in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
The away team have replaced Carles Gil with Michael Mancienne. This is the fourth substitution made today by Bruce Arena.
